content.rendered:
THE ’90S MINIMALIST TREND

The ’90s minimalist trend does not seem to lose any popularity and will continue to be popular for years to come. For this look, we are focusing on a simple, clean look with lots of black and white. Throw in oversized tops with sleek running shorts and add a chunky gold necklace for an easy, modern take on an old favorite.

The black nylon Prada bag is a must to achieve this ’90s minimalist trend. Feel free to do a natural makeup look, or just go bare-faced with your lashes on display. At night you can throw on a silk skirt and a red lip and you’re ready to join some friends for a socially distanced drink while you support your local businesses.

Both looks are from FWRD.COM. Prada bag is available on Prada.com. Lashes are by yours truly D’Lashes.com. The chunky gold necklace is from Tiffany & Co. The black sandals are from Gucci are super popular right now! Both the sunglasses and the gold earring are from FWRD.COM

Wishing you all tons of love, health, and safety!

Xo Xo, Dionne

P.S. Shop D’Lashes Beauty, Your One on One Live Lash Session, Candles, and A-List Strip Lashes Here.
